review: If you are looking for an easy solution for adding smart-TV capabilities to a TV that doesn't have them, this is a great purchase. Even if your TV has applications, you can't go wrong with this device. It's much more powerful than an Apple TV or Roku and even has a voice-enabled remote to simply say what you are searching for.Pros:* Voice remote works perfectly. I've had no issues with the device processing my words and returning relevant results* Device turns on my TV (TV must have the power-on HDMI feature) when I press a remote button* Can stream content from my Android phone to my Fire TV* Has wide selection of Prime Video content to enjoy (for Prime subscribers)* Many top selling apps to choose from (Netflix, Plex, many others)* Has one USB port to connect a controller for games* Very small form factor that doesn't draw attention to itself* Auto updatesCons:* Remote is small enough to lose in couch cushions

Do the Amazon Fire Instructionsmention this?  No.I am ready to pull out what is left of my hair!
